item.description:
note this event is hoted by the Rochester 912 Project

We will be discussing our rights to own and bear arms in NH as well as does NH need a volunteer militia to defend our freedom. It is obvious our rights as free citizens are under assault and we need to discuss how we defend them. Should we form a NH militia?
x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x
item.name: How do we defend our Rights to own firearms and what about a NH Militia?
